title: Well developed property, move in ready - LIP 039
details: LIP-039 A well-developed property comprising of two accommodation blocks with 5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms each. A large swimming pool in the garden with living area, well equipped kitchen and store room. All rooms have hot water and are air conditioned. The property has electricity and city water line. The property lends itself to an exceptional yoga retreat or small health spa retreat. Far enough inland to be away from the hustle and bustle of the busy Unawatuna tourist area yet close enough for beach visits and entertainment.
